procedure.title: DoES Emergency Works Scheme 2022: CAT 2 Roof Works Project at Presentation Secondary School, Ballyphehane - School Roll No. 62693K
procedure.description:
**Title:** DoES Emergency Works Scheme 2022: CAT 2 Roof Works Project at Presentation Secondary School, Ballyphehane - School Roll No. 62693K

**Description:**
It is proposed to undertake comprehensive Roof Works to an existing flat roof deck at Presentation Secondary School, Ballyphehane, which was originally constructed in the 1960s. The scope of works includes the replacement or redressing of localized Lead Flashing, installation of new Parapet Capping, and a complete installation of a new Roof Membrane. Additionally, improved Insulation will be incorporated, along with the installation of a new Rain Water System. Upon completion of the external roofing works, it is proposed to redecorate all internal affected areas with a paint finish in a selected color.

**Key Requirements:**
- **Roofing Experience:** The bidder must have extensive experience in roofing projects, particularly with flat roof decks and asphalt finishes.
- **Lead Flashing Replacement:** The bidder should have expertise in replacing or redressing localized Lead Flashing to ensure water-tightness and durability.
- **Parapet Capping Installation:** The bidder must be capable of installing new Parapet Capping to provide a secure and watertight seal.
- **Roof Membrane Installation:** The bidder should have experience in installing new Roof Membranes, ensuring they meet modern standards for durability and water resistance.
- **Insulation Upgrade:** The bidder must be able to upgrade the existing insulation to improve thermal efficiency and reduce energy costs.
- **Rain Water System Installation:** The bidder should have expertise in installing a new Rain Water System, ensuring it is integrated seamlessly with the new roofing structure.
- **Internal Decorations:** The bidder must be capable of redecorating all internal affected areas with a paint finish in a selected color, maintaining the school's aesthetic standards.

**Additional Considerations:**
- **Health and Safety:** The bidder must adhere to strict health and safety protocols, ensuring the safety of students, staff, and contractors during the project.
- **Environmental Impact:** The bidder should minimize environmental impact by using sustainable materials and practices where possible.
- **Project Timeline:** The bidder should provide a detailed project timeline, ensuring the works are completed within the specified timeframe to minimize disruption to the school's operations.
- **Quality Assurance:** The bidder must demonstrate a commitment to quality assurance, providing evidence of previous projects and client testimonials.

**Submission Requirements:**
- **Detailed Proposal:** A comprehensive proposal outlining the bidder's approach, methodology, and timeline.
- **Technical Specifications:** Detailed technical specifications for the proposed works, including materials and equipment to be used.
- **Health and Safety Plan:** A health and safety plan detailing measures to be taken during the project.
- **Environmental Impact Assessment:** An environmental impact assessment outlining measures to minimize environmental impact.
- **Previous Experience:** Documentation of previous roofing projects, including case studies and client testimonials.
- **Insurance and Certifications:** Proof of insurance and relevant certifications (e.g., ISO 9001, ISO 14001).

By considering these requirements and additional considerations, bidders can effectively demonstrate their suitability for this project and ensure that the Roof Works at Presentation Secondary School, Ballyphehane, are completed to the highest standards.
